name: lib:DiceTray
description:
A lightweigth webframe based dice roller. Use it to roll dice with a more intuitive feel than just typing a formula
[macro("diceTrayLoader@lib:DiceTray"):0] or [macro("diceTrayOverlay@lib:DiceTray"):0] starts it

Click on a dice to roll it. Right click to remove it

[macro("closeDiceOverlay@lib:DiceTray"):0] if you want to completely close the overlay
shortDescription: A lightweigth webframe based dice roller
